messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fore Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Nut nation door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.
